name: Archaea
description: Microscopic single-celled organisms belonging to the domain Archaea, often found in extreme environments.

name: Bacteria
description: Microscopic single-celled prokaryotic organisms widely distributed in various environments, including soil, water, and living organisms.

name: Eukaryota
description: Organisms with complex cells containing a membrane-bound nucleus and organelles. This domain includes plants, animals, fungi, and protists.
